quotes.message: Leave all the afternoon for exercise and recreation, which are as necessary as reading. I will rather say more necessary because health is worth more than learning.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: The mind is the limit. As long as the mind can envision the fact that you can do something, you can do it, as long as you really believe 100 percent.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: You have to train your mind like you train your body.
quotes.name: Bruce Jenner

quotes.message: The vision of a champion is someone who is bent over, drenched in sweat, at the point of exhaustion, when no one else is watching.
quotes.name: Anson Dorrance

quotes.message: Your health account, your bank account, they're the same thing. The more you put in, the more you can take out. Exercise is king and nutrition is queen. Together you have a kingdom.
quotes.name: Jack Lalanne

quotes.message: Your mind will quit 100 times before your body ever does. Feel the pain and do it anyway.
quotes.name: Larissa Reis

quotes.message: The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: When you stay consistent with working out, you start to look good, which also leads to feeling good from the inside to the outside.
quotes.name: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.message: To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise.
quotes.name: Gene Tunney

quotes.message: Bodybuilding is much like any other sport. To be successful, you must dedicate yourself 100% to your training, diet and mental approach.
quotes.name: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.message: I hated every minute of training, but I said, â€˜Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life a champion.
quotes.name: Muhammad Ali

quotes.message: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
quotes.name: Jim Ryin

quotes.message: The purpose of training is to tighten up the slack, toughen the body, and polish the spirit.
quotes.name: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.message: Don't show up late. Don't try to slide out early. Don't cheat your rep counts. And, definitely, don't hold back. Leave it all in the gym.
quotes.name: Gunnar Peterson

quotes.message: A muscle is like a car. If you want it to run well early in the morning, you have to warm it up.
quotes.name: Florence Griffith Joyner

quotes.message: Even if you don't have time for a big workout, stretching in the morning and night really changes your body.
quotes.name: Erin Heatherton

quotes.message: Every time you work out you strengthen your body. Every time you don't you weaken it.
quotes.name: Toni Sorenson

quotes.message: Exercise is life in motion.
quotes.name: Toni Sorenson

quotes.message: Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body.
quotes.name: Joseph Addison

quotes.message: Fitness is not about being better than someone else. It's about being better than you used to be.
quotes.name: Khloe Kardashian

quotes.message: Physical fitness is not only one of the most important keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: You're going to have to let it hurt. Let it suck. The harder you work, the better you will look. Your appearance isn't parallel to how heavy you lift, it's parallel to how hard you work.
quotes.name: Joe Manganiello

quotes.message: You're only one workout away from a good mood.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: No one ever drowned in sweat.
quotes.name: Lou Holtz

quotes.message: When working out, length is not a substitute for intensity.
quotes.name: Bill Loguidice

quotes.message: Not only are squats not bad for the knees, every legitimate research study on this subject has shown that squats improve knee stability and therefore help reduce the risk of injuries.
quotes.name: Charles Poliquin

quotes.message: When people tell me they can't afford to join a gym, I tell them to go outside; planet Earth is a gym and we're already members. Run, climb, sweat, and enjoy all of the natural wonder that is available to you.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: It's not what you do in the gym that makes you fit, it's what you do all day.
quotes.name: Bonnie Pfiester

quotes.message: Just because the summer is over doesn't mean that we should stop working out to keep ourselves in shape. Staying in shape is primarily for your health, and not just to look good on the outside.
quotes.name: Edmond Mbiaka
